item.title: Blazor .NET 8 Object Mapping with AutoMapper
item.description: Blazor .NET 8 Object Mapping with AutoMapper How to perform object mapping in a Blazor application using AutoMapper. Object mapping is the process of converting one object type to another, which can be useful when transferring data between different layers of an application or when displaying data in a different format. AutoMapper: AutoMapper is a popular object-to-object mapping library in the .NET ecosystem. It simplifies the process of mapping one object to another by automatically matching properties with similar names and types.
